description:
Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo`s refuge, making his way through Doflamingo`s guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit! But with Fujitora`s ability to call down a meteor, will Sabo have to power to save himself?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!
Daigekitotsu! Sanbou Souchou Sabo vs Taishou Fujitora
Un duel de choc. Sabo le chef d`État-Major contre l`Amiral Fujitora !
Грандиозное столкновение. Начальник штаба Сабо против адмирала Фуджиторы
اصطدام كبير! رئيس الأركان سابو ضدّ الأميرال فوجيتورا!
大激突! 参謀総長サボVS大将藤虎
